Control Flow

If Statements

if health > 0 {
    println("Alive!")
}

Else

if health > 0 {
    println("Alive!")
} else {
    println("Game Over")
}

Else If

if score >= 100 {
    println("A")
} else if score >= 70 {
    println("B")
} else if score >= 50 {
    println("C")
} else {
    println("F")
}

Nested Conditions

if is_alive {
    if has_key {
        open_door()
    }
}
